answers.answer: Could you try again?  Are you asking about diabetes?What is "aut" or "aunt"?
Your post is hard to understand.  Are you trying to say your daughter has "blood" in her urine?

Does she mean Aunt Flow?  I'm guessing with spade22 that she thinks her 2 year old is having a period.  Our friends little girl got one at the age of 5 for 3 consecutive months and after a lot of testing, they took her off of diet soda and it stopped and she's never had another problem.  She's 20 now.  This stopped me in my tracks for sure on drinking diet anything...my kids get the regular stuff (neither drink soda but NO zero calorie lemonade or Crystal light or sugar free jello, etc.)  Just a thought on what she's asking.

question: aut is comming in urine of my two years old child  but pathological test not show sugar or any other sympton  bay is healthi  but she has constipation
title: aunt is comming in my 2 years old girl about two month ago but pathological test not show sugar or any other symptam
